title: Land with house in Mount Lavinia
details:
21.6 perches - 3 bedrooms - 2 bathrooms - Lobby area - Living area - Dining area - Pantry - Kitchen - Front garden - Backyard

This charming house has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a large living area, front garden and backyard. There are ventilation ports throughout the house the allow fresh air to flow through the house. A large garden is the perfect opportunity for people who love garden as well as for both children and pets with the amount of space there is. The interior of the house is open and airy which creates a cool atmosphere on hot days. But since the property is being sold at land value, the property can be used for any purpose whether it be to build a house or small private office because of its great access point.

Mount Lavinia has many access points to popular areas such as Rathmalana, Dehiwala, Boralesgamuwa, Werahera, Moratuwa and Bokundara. Access to banks, hospitals, schools and supermarkets is convenients because the house is located close to the main road. Restaurants, bars and cafes are abundant throughout the area.
